intro: Oreocome stelliphora, commonly known as the star-flowered oreocome, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in rocky or arid environments, showcasing its adaptability to harsh conditions. Its flowers are small and star-shaped, with white to pale yellow petals, contributing to its ornamental appeal. Oreocome stelliphora is often found in high-altitude regions, where it thrives in well-drained soils.
